thread.title: Daniel Zyrus Florendo
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by Daniel Zyrus Florendo

author: Daniel Zyrus Florendo
title: Daniel Zyrus Florendo
text: My friend recommended me on this site to have my ticket at a cheapest price and I'm not that confident to travel along and also this is my first time travelling by myself so I may have alot of questions on what to do before, after and during the flight and all of it made me satisfied that they keep being patient specially for the first timer like me that doesn't know that much. Giving 5 star for securing not just my flight but securing me as well.
